item.title: S&P 500 futures slip, head for losing week as postelection rally loses steam: Live updates
item.description: The three major indexes finished Thursday's session in the red, and they are bound for weekly losses.

item.title: Former BOE member on what Trump's reelection could mean for the UK
item.description: John Gieve, former deputy governor at the Bank of England, speaks to CNBC's Silvia Amaro about monetary policy and Trump tariff implications.

item.title: Bavarian Nordic sinks 15% as European markets shift lower; UK GDP ticks up slightly
item.description: European markets were mixed Friday, as investors assessed fresh economic data and comments from U.S. Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell.

item.title: U.S. finalizes $6.6 billion chips award for TSMC ahead of Trump return
item.description: The U.S. Commerce Department said it has finalized a $6.6 billion government subsidy for TSMC's U.S. unit for semiconductor production in Phoenix, Ari...

item.title: UK economy surprises with September contraction, grows just 0.1% in the third quarter
item.description: The U.K. economy showed a surprise contraction in September and only marginal growth in the third quarter, initial figures showed Friday.
